term_1_des: Please read these terms carefully before using this site. This website, provided by Arch Capital, is intended for informational purposes. By accessing the site or downloading materials, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you disagree, please refrain from using or downloading from the site.
term_2_des: All content on this site, including texts, images, videos, and audio, is owned by Arch Capital unless specified otherwise.
term_3_des: Arch Capital endeavors to ensure the accuracy and reliability of content on this site. However, the firm does not guarantee the completeness of materials or the dependability of any advice, opinion, or information presented. Reliance on such information is at the user's own risk. Arch Capital reserves the right to correct errors and make changes to the site, including materials, products, and services, at any time without prior notification.
cookies_des: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year. If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser. When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select 'Remember Me', your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed. If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.
policy_2_des: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection. An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.
policy_3_des: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.
policy_4_des: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website. These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.
policy_5_title: Who we share your data with
policy_5_des: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.
policy_6_title: How long we retain your data
policy_6_des: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue. For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.
policy_7_title: What rights you have over your data
policy_7_des: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.
policy_8_des: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.
explore_key_statistics: Explore key statistics and data visualizations to understand trends and make informed decisions.
arch_financial_overview: Arch Financial is an independent joint-stock company licensed by the Saudi Financial Market Authority with license number 32-20214 dated 22/11/2020 for managing investments and operating funds, starting its business operations on 26/08/2021. It is involved in arranging securities, providing advice on securities with a paid-up capital of SAR 20 million. Arch Financial focuses on managing family assets and wealth, working in your best interest. We effectively structure assets and wealth and represent families and companies in the Middle East to achieve sustainable value, progress, and long-term success. Activities in securities we are licensed to practice
protection_and_awareness_of_the_investor: Protection and awareness of the investor

grow_wealth_contact: If you’re looking to grow your wealth or simply have questions about investing and matters of finance such as pensions, don’t hesitate to contact us; we will be happy to help you out.
al_safa_street_al_nahdha_district: Al Safa street, Al Nahdha District
